paper_abstract: This paper deals with the derivation of macroscopic equations from the underlying kinetic model delivered by the kinetic theory of active particles with discrete microscopic states. Hyperbolic models for local density and mean velocity are obtained with the aim at adding further knowledge to mathematical methods for modelling living matter. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: From the mathematical kinetic theory for active particles on the derivation of hyperbolic macroscopic tissue models
